授業目的: This course is an intermediate writing course for nonnative English speakers. It is a continuation of the Spring semester Writng 1 course. This course will teach students how to write four different types of paragraphs.
到達目標: To help students write good paragraphs and to build vocabulary.
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法: Lecture / Book Practice Exercises / Writing Assignments

トピック.授業外学習2:
All papers will need to be typed on A４ paper using 12 point and Times New Roman fonts.
Students will need a USB memory stick to store all class materials and work.
Students MUST have an active e-mail account either with their Kwansei Gakuin e-mail, gmail, hotmail, or yahoomail.
Studnets MUST buy a NEW book so they can access the online homework activities. Students MUST have the book on the first day of classes to register for the online homework. Students CANNOT buy a used book because the access code for the online homework will not work.
